website_summaries.verdict: Once you figure out which shade is best for you, chances are you'll love BarePRO Performance Wear's long-lasting, full matte coverage and skin-loving ingredients.
pros: This liquid mineral foundation earns praise for offering long wear – up to 24 hours
Contains enzymes that improves skin's texture and bamboo extract for a soft finish
Gives full coverage without feeling overly heavy
cons: Matte finish may look patchy on skin that's prone to dryness
Some shades have a yellow undertone that isn't flattering for everyone

customer_reviews.title: Bare Minerals has a great eyeprimer but is very expensive and very small tube
customer_reviews.text: Product absolutely stays on. I also use a dab on eyelids for primer. Bare Minerals has a great eyeprimer but is very expensive and very small tube. I also like to use this just in the t-zone. That's wear I usually get shine and this helps control it without having a full face of foundation. Size is generous.
customer_reviews.author: Bridget B.

customer_reviews.title: great for oily skin
customer_reviews.text: this is really good for my oily skin and it's a great mixing foundation if you want to mix it to make it more mattifying. if you have dry skin or even normal skin, i wouldn't really recommend it because it is very drying. but i found it to be perfect for me.
customer_reviews.author: sailorice

customer_reviews.title: Very Irritating and Damaging
customer_reviews.text: Horrible product! My skin was fine this evening but then I tried this! This has irritated my skin so badly. It is very painfully red and flared up now. I put a cold milk compress on it after cleaning off the makeup to make it bearable but it still really hurts and my skin looks terrible. I wish I had not used this makeup when I opened the bottle. It has an aweful smell. I thought this would be natural and gentle. It also looked weird when I tried it. Never again!
customer_reviews.author: Mel Cal

customer_reviews.title: Lasts all day!
customer_reviews.text: I will never buy a different kind of foundation. This one is great for my oily skin and keeps my face looking like I just put on make up all day long! It’s also waterproof so it doesn’t wash off if you get wet! It does wash off easily though when you’re washing your face with soap it’ll come off nice.
customer_reviews.author: Kenzie Gaskill

customer_reviews.title: Not the greatest. But Ok for the price.
customer_reviews.text: This is not like bare minerals foundation. The coverage is more like a tinted sunscreen,that barely tints your face.
customer_reviews.author: Rachael Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money if you are looking for a full coverage foundation
customer_reviews.text: It wasn't full coverage and it separated on my face. Very thin product
customer_reviews.author: Gale Bender

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great make up poor bottle. The squirt top quit working right away
customer_reviews.author: Trudy

customer_reviews.title: Good product, great price, watch the color
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing you can buy this on Amazon for so much cheaper. Ulta is seriously overpriced selling it for $40. I promptly returned it and bought it from here. Just make sure to double check the color. Because I'm usually the lightest shade of fair and this was more of an ivory. I thought it had said fair on it but it was different. Great product though and for a much more reasonable price. Ulta just lost some business.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and long lasting.
customer_reviews.text: This foundation is lightweight, long lasting and take the heat in Texas.
customer_reviews.author: Tamsien

customer_reviews.title: too light but good coverage
customer_reviews.text: it give good coverage but it is very dry so I mix it with cc cream foundation and it works out well
customer_reviews.author: Susan M.

customer_reviews.title: Not for daytime so much.
customer_reviews.text: Probaly better for night time use, doesn't look great in natural light, but definitely lasts.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal L.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty sure this is Counterfeit.
customer_reviews.text: I don't think this was real BareMinerals. It was awful. Was completely the wrong color and It literally felt like I was putting Clay on my face. It was not blendableat all. If you try to re-wet it to blend- it just made it streaky and it was very drying. Made my face feels like the Sahara desert. I returned it immediately!
customer_reviews.author: Jo

customer_reviews.title: Item as described. Fast delivery
customer_reviews.text: I use this makeup often. I do have to mix it with another foundation as it is a little thin. That is just the way the makeup is manufactured thou and has nothing to do with the seller. It was brand new in the box and was shipped and delivered very quickly. Great seller!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wrong shade
customer_reviews.text: Amazon sent the wrong shade ordered warm light 07 received cashmere 06. 😞will be returning it. I love Bare Minerals products .
customer_reviews.author: Abbegail Grant

customer_reviews.title: good foundation for oily skin
customer_reviews.text: I was given this foundation thanks to influenter. to try and give my honest opinion. It is a very fluid base, enough liquid, and to my surprise has an excellent coverage. It is very good for my oily skin, lasted grand part of the day
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Would like more coverage
customer_reviews.text: I really like how lightweight this feels on the face and I appreciate the good-for-you ingredients that they use. However, I would've liked to have seen more coverage. It's about light to medium coverage on my skin, even though it claims to be full coverage. Visit my blog at christinaschiccorner.com to read my more detailed review I posted about it.
customer_reviews.author: Christina LeighTop Contributor: Makeup

product_meta.title: bareMinerals Barepro Performance Wear Liquid Foundation SPF 20 07 Warm Light for Women, 1 Ounce
product_meta.description: This foundation is provides natural looking full coverage. It is heat, humidity, water, and sweat-resistant foundation that provides broad spectrum non-chemical SPF 20/ PA++ sun protection.
feature_bullets: provides natural looking full coverage. Gluten free
It provides broad spectrum non chemical spf 20 sun protection
Sweat resistant, water resistant, humidity resistant and heat resistant
Country of origin is United States
